cache.title: cache
cache.excerpt: Adds, removes, fetches, and flushes the WP Object Cache object.

cache\/add.title: cache add
cache\/add.excerpt: Adds a value to the object cache.

cache\/decr.title: cache decr
cache\/decr.excerpt: Decrements a value in the object cache.

cache\/delete.title: cache delete
cache\/delete.excerpt: Removes a value from the object cache.

cache\/flush-group.title: cache flush-group
cache\/flush-group.excerpt: Removes all cache items in a group, if the object cache implementation supports it.

cache\/get.title: cache get
cache\/get.excerpt: Gets a value from the object cache.

cache\/incr.title: cache incr
cache\/incr.excerpt: Increments a value in the object cache.

cache\/replace.title: cache replace
cache\/replace.excerpt: Replaces a value in the object cache, if the value already exists.

cache\/set.title: cache set
cache\/set.excerpt: Sets a value to the object cache, regardless of whether it already exists.

cache\/supports.title: cache supports
cache\/supports.excerpt: Determines whether the object cache implementation supports a particular feature.

cache\/type.title: cache type
cache\/type.excerpt: Attempts to determine which object cache is being used.

cap.title: cap
cap.excerpt: Adds, removes, and lists capabilities of a user role.

cap\/add.title: cap add
cap\/add.excerpt: Adds capabilities to a given role.

cap\/list.title: cap list
cap\/list.excerpt: Lists capabilities for a given role.

cap\/remove.title: cap remove
cap\/remove.excerpt: Removes capabilities from a given role.

cli.title: cli
cli.excerpt: Reviews current WP-CLI info, checks for updates, or views defined aliases.

cli\/alias.title: cli alias
cli\/alias.excerpt: Retrieves, sets and updates aliases for WordPress Installations.

cli\/alias\/get.title: cli alias get
cli\/alias\/get.excerpt: Gets the value for an alias.

cli\/alias\/is-group.title: cli alias is-group
cli\/alias\/is-group.excerpt: Check whether an alias is a group.

cli\/check-update.title: cli check-update
cli\/check-update.excerpt: Checks to see if there is a newer version of WP-CLI available.

cli\/cmd-dump.title: cli cmd-dump
cli\/cmd-dump.excerpt: Dumps the list of installed commands, as JSON.

cli\/info.title: cli info
cli\/info.excerpt: Prints various details about the WP-CLI environment.

cli\/param-dump.title: cli param-dump
cli\/param-dump.excerpt: Dumps the list of global parameters, as JSON or in var_export format.

cli\/update.title: cli update
cli\/update.excerpt: Updates WP-CLI to the latest release.

comment.title: comment
comment.excerpt: Creates, updates, deletes, and moderates comments.

comment\/count.title: comment count
comment\/count.excerpt: Counts comments, on whole blog or on a given post.

comment\/generate.title: comment generate
comment\/generate.excerpt: Generates some number of new dummy comments.

comment\/get.title: comment get
comment\/get.excerpt: Gets the data of a single comment.

comment\/meta.title: comment meta
comment\/meta.excerpt: Adds, updates, deletes, and lists comment custom fields.

comment\/meta\/list.title: comment meta list
comment\/meta\/list.excerpt: List all metadata associated with an object.

comment\/meta\/patch.title: comment meta patch
comment\/meta\/patch.excerpt: Update a nested value for a meta field.

comment\/meta\/pluck.title: comment meta pluck
comment\/meta\/pluck.excerpt: Get a nested value from a meta field.

comment\/recount.title: comment recount
comment\/recount.excerpt: Recalculates the comment_count value for one or more posts.

comment\/status.title: comment status
comment\/status.excerpt: Gets the status of a comment.

config.title: config
config.excerpt: Generates and reads the wp-config.php file.

config\/delete.title: config delete
config\/delete.excerpt: Deletes a specific constant or variable from the wp-config.php file.

config\/edit.title: config edit
config\/edit.excerpt: Launches system editor to edit the wp-config.php file.

config\/get.title: config get
config\/get.excerpt: Gets the value of a specific constant or variable defined in wp-config.php file.

config\/has.title: config has
config\/has.excerpt: Checks whether a specific constant or variable exists in the wp-config.php file.

config\/is-true.title: config is-true
config\/is-true.excerpt: Determines whether value of a specific defined constant or variable is truthy.

config\/list.title: config list
config\/list.excerpt: Lists variables, constants, and file includes defined in wp-config.php file.

config\/path.title: config path
config\/path.excerpt: Gets the path to wp-config.php file.

config\/set.title: config set
config\/set.excerpt: Sets the value of a specific constant or variable defined in wp-config.php file.

config\/shuffle-salts.title: config shuffle-salts
config\/shuffle-salts.excerpt: Refreshes the salts defined in the wp-config.php file.

core.title: core
core.excerpt: Downloads, installs, updates, and manages a WordPress installation.

core\/check-update.title: core check-update
core\/check-update.excerpt: Checks for WordPress updates via Version Check API.

core\/install.title: core install
core\/install.excerpt: Runs the standard WordPress installation process.

core\/multisite-convert.title: core multisite-convert
core\/multisite-convert.excerpt: Transforms an existing single-site installation into a multisite installation.

core\/update.title: core update
core\/update.excerpt: Updates WordPress to a newer version.

core\/update-db.title: core update-db
core\/update-db.excerpt: Runs the WordPress database update procedure.

core\/verify-checksums.title: core verify-checksums
core\/verify-checksums.excerpt: Verifies WordPress files against WordPress.org's checksums.

cron.title: cron
cron.excerpt: Tests, runs, and deletes WP-Cron events; manages WP-Cron schedules.

cron\/event.excerpt: Schedules, runs, and deletes WP-Cron events.

cron\/event\/delete.title: cron event delete
cron\/event\/delete.excerpt: Deletes all scheduled cron events for the given hook.

cron\/event\/run.title: cron event run
cron\/event\/run.excerpt: Runs the next scheduled cron event for the given hook.

cron\/event\/unschedule.title: cron event unschedule
cron\/event\/unschedule.excerpt: Unschedules all cron events for a given hook.

cron\/test.title: cron test
cron\/test.excerpt: Tests the WP Cron spawning system and reports back its status.

db.title: db
db.excerpt: Performs basic database operations using credentials stored in wp-config.php.

db\/check.title: db check
db\/check.excerpt: Checks the current status of the database.

db\/clean.title: db clean
db\/clean.excerpt: Removes all tables with `$table_prefix` from the database.

db\/cli.title: db cli
db\/cli.excerpt: Opens a MySQL console using credentials from wp-config.php

db\/columns.title: db columns
db\/columns.excerpt: Displays information about a given table.

db\/export.title: db export
db\/export.excerpt: Exports the database to a file or to STDOUT.

db\/import.title: db import
db\/import.excerpt: Imports a database from a file or from STDIN.

db\/query.title: db query
db\/query.excerpt: Executes a SQL query against the database.

db\/reset.title: db reset
db\/reset.excerpt: Removes all tables from the database.

db\/search.title: db search
db\/search.excerpt: Finds a string in the database.

db\/size.title: db size
db\/size.excerpt: Displays the database name and size.

embed.title: embed
embed.excerpt: Inspects oEmbed providers, clears embed cache, and more.

embed\/cache.title: embed cache
embed\/cache.excerpt: Finds, triggers, and deletes oEmbed caches.

embed\/cache\/clear.excerpt: Deletes all oEmbed caches for a given post.

embed\/cache\/find.title: embed cache find
embed\/cache\/find.excerpt: Finds an oEmbed cache post ID for a given URL.

embed\/cache\/trigger.title: embed cache trigger
embed\/cache\/trigger.excerpt: Triggers the caching of all oEmbed results for a given post.

embed\/fetch.title: embed fetch
embed\/fetch.excerpt: Attempts to convert a URL into embed HTML.

embed\/provider\/match.title: embed provider match
embed\/provider\/match.excerpt: Gets the matching provider for a given URL.

eval-file.title: eval-file
eval-file.excerpt: Loads and executes a PHP file.

export.title: export
export.excerpt: Exports WordPress content to a WXR file.

help.title: help
help.excerpt: Gets help on WP-CLI, or on a specific command.

i18n.title: i18n
i18n.excerpt: Provides internationalization tools for WordPress projects.

i18n\/make-json.title: i18n make-json
i18n\/make-json.excerpt: Extract JavaScript strings from PO files and add them to individual JSON files.

i18n\/make-mo.excerpt: Create MO files from PO files.

i18n\/make-php.excerpt: Create PHP files from PO files.

i18n\/make-pot.excerpt: Create a POT file for a WordPress project.

i18n\/update-po.title: i18n update-po
i18n\/update-po.excerpt: Update PO files from a POT file.

import.title: import
import.excerpt: Imports content from a given WXR file.

widget\/deactivate.excerpt: Deactivates one or more widgets from an active sidebar.

widget\/delete.title: widget delete
widget\/delete.excerpt: Deletes one or more widgets from a sidebar.

widget\/list.title: widget list
widget\/list.excerpt: Lists widgets associated with a sidebar.

widget\/move.title: widget move
widget\/move.excerpt: Moves the position of a widget.

widget\/update.title: widget update
widget\/update.excerpt: Updates options for an existing widget.
